transfer.description: Transfers tokens to a specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens on behalf of another address.

approve.description: Approves a spender to withdraw tokens from the owner's account.

increaseApproval.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender.

decreaseApproval.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens a spender is allowed to withdraw from the owner's account.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to the specified address.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a given address.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.

DECIMAL_ZEROS.description: Returns the number of zero decimal places of the token.

crowdsale.description: Returns the address of the crowdsale contract.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given crowdsale address.

Approval.description: Emitted when a token approval is granted.

Transfer.description: Emitted when a token transfer occurs.
